snippet.title: Just One Voice (Whispers of the Luminaries) IDOL DEBUT SINGLE feat. @chiisanauta
snippet.description:
✨ I WROTE A SONG FOR A VIDEO GAME!! 🔥
"Whispers of the Luminaries is an idol-themed detective mystery game, blending slice-of-life with deduction gameplay." That's the quote from the devs, and as a big fan of visual novels and Ace Attorney, it sounds pretty dope! There's gonna be a demo of the game coming out on Steam on June 23rd, so you're def gonna want to check that out when it drops--you know I will be :D. Writing a song for a game has been one of my dreams for many years so this project is such a massive honor, and it was even more incredible to be able to feature the amazing chiisa on the track!! Huge thanks to Winston from VR Heaven for having me on to write this song 🙏

Go check out the Steam page here! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2393870/Whispers_of_the_Luminaries/
And you can sign up for their mailing list here! 
https://vrheaven.io
You can follow the devs on Twitter here! https://x.com/VRHeavenNews

Subscribe to @chiisanauta !
Follow her on Twitter! https://x.com/chiisanauta

Follow me on Twitter! https://twitter.com/djguthrie5
Follow me on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/davidguthriemusic/
Support me on Ko-fi! https://ko-fi.com/davidguthriemusic

FULL CREDITS: 
Written, composed, produced, performed on guitar, mixed, and mastered by David Guthrie
Vocals performed by chiisa
Harmonies written by chiisa
Video made by Winston from VR Heaven https://x.com/VRHeavenNews
Character art by Sion https://x.com/Sion_tw
Design by Negai Lab https://x.com/NegaiLab/

Equipment: 
Electric Guitars: Squier Affinity Strat w/Seymour Duncan Custom 5, Ibanez Jem Jr
Pick: Dragon's Heart GT
Guitar Tone: Neural DSP Archetype Petrucci
Bass: SubMission Audio EUROBASS II and Scarbee MM Bass
Drums: Superior Drummer 2 Progressive Foundry
DAW: Reaper
Headphones: AKG K701
Audio Interface: Focusrite Scarlett 2i2
